fnCode:
import time
    
cmd = [0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0]

cmd[0] = 0x1c  #Device address 0c,1c,2c,3c,4c
cmd[1] = 4  #command   
cmd[2] = 0
cmd[3] = 0  
cmd[4] = 0
cmd[5] = 0x0a
#crc = pycrc.ModbusCRC(cmd[0:5])
##cmd[6] = crc & 0xFF
#cmd[7] = crc >> 8
print (cmd)
time.sleep(0.2)
msg["payload"] = cmd        
return msg
